TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventBindingService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService
Public MustInherit Class EventBindingService Implements IEventBindingService

summary.span: 接口的默认实现。

span.span: A default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过为注册组件事件的事件处理程序提供的服务提供了一种链接与设计器代码中的组件事件的事件处理程序。By providing a service for registering event handlers for component events, provides a way to link an event handler with a component event from designer code.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

summary.span: 提供一个通知，声明特定方法不再由某个事件处理程序使用。

span.span: Provides a notification that a particular method is no longer being used by an event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些实现可能想要删除的事件处理程序，任何事件未被使用。Some implementations may intend to remove the event hander when no events are using it. 通过重写和，实现可以推断当不再需要一种方法。By overriding and , an implementation can infer when a method is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回集合中每个字符串是方法名称的方法的签名中包含的委托与兼容`e`。Each string returned in the collection is the method name of a method whose signature is compatible with the delegate contained in `e`. 如果名称不兼容，则应返回一个空集合。 should return an empty collection if no names are compatible.

span.span: The method name to validate.

summary.span: 验证提供的方法名称对于正在使用的语言或脚本是有效的。

span.span: Validates that the provided method name is valid for the language or script being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 可以重写此和引发异常，如果你使用的名称无效。You may override this and throw an exception if the name is invalid for your use.
